resources.string: [Function Description] \nEnable accessibility permissions to take screenshots for translation.\nWhen granting permissions, a warning will pop up. Please rest assured that MoeTranslate will not collect any of your information.

It looks like your Android version is less than Android 11 (API 30) or Harmony OS version is less than 3.0, which means that you cannot use the translation function of this software, but you can still use other functions except translation. If you want to experience all the functions of this software, please upgrade the system or change the device.
Do you want to update now? Click Update to jump to the official website of MoeTranslate. Click Download on the official website to get the latest version.

It looks like you have selected NLLB as the translation model, but it seems that the NLLB model file has not been downloaded yet, so translation is not possible. Click Go to Download to enter the download page; of course, you can also choose other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It looks like you have selected %s as the translation API, but it seems that you have not configured it yet, so translation is not possible. Click Config to enter the API settings page; of course, you can also select other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It looks like you have used a custom translation API, but it seems that you have not configured it yet, so translation is not possible. Click Config to enter the API settings page; of course, you can also choose other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate accessibility permissions. Screenshot Translation requires accessibility permissions to take screenshots. Click to grant accessibility permissions to grant the app.

The specific authorization path varies slightly on devices of different brands, roughly:
General tab → Downloaded apps → Find "MoeTranslateTranslation Service" → Use "MoeTranslate Translation Service".
When granting permissions, a warning will pop up. Please rest assured that MoeTranslate will not collect any of your information.

It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate floating window permission. Screenshot Translation needs to obtain floating window permission to display the floating ball anytime and anywhere. Click to grant to grant the app floating window permission. 

The specific authorization path is roughly: 
find MoeTranslate in the list → grant MoeTranslate the permission to display on top of other applications.
It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate notification permission. Screenshot Translation requires notification permission. Click Grant to grant the app notification permission.
Network Error, please check and try again
Failed to get notification, maybe the network is not connected
Select the translation mode you wish to use

Perform offline OCR locally to extract text from the image, and then translate the text. Supports local AI offline text translation, as well as the use of preset cloud text translation APIs and custom cloud text translation APIs. Note that offline OCR recognition only supports Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean. This method consumes very little data traffic; if you choose to process it completely locally, you can even do it completely offline.

Upload the screenshot directly to the cloud API for translation. It supports using the preset cloud image translation API, and also supports using the custom cloud image translation API. It does not support local translation. This method consumes relatively more data traffic.

Google\'s machine learning kit runs on the device and is suitable for casual and simple translation. You need to download a model file of about 100MB for the first run. After the download is complete, you can use it right away without the need for a network connection. Click \"Manage ML Kit model files\" below to download and delete model files.

Meta\'s model, which is designed for translation, is called \"No Language Left Behind\". As the name suggests, it supports multiple languages. The translation effect of this model is better, but it also needs to be downloaded before use. When running for the first time, you need to download a model file of about 1GB. At the same time, the device needs to have at least 6GB of RAM to use this model. After the download is complete, there is no need for a network connection, and it can be used immediately. Click \"Manage NLLB model files\" below to download and delete model files.

Baidu Translate\'s API, click \"Manage Baidu Translate API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 1 million characters per month).

Tencent Cloud\'s translation API, click \"Manage Tencent Cloud API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 5 million characters per month).
(Advanced settings) Customize the Cloud Text Translation API
Manage custom cloud text translation API1
Manage custom cloud text translation API2
Manage custom cloud text translation API3
Current Translation Mode：Local OCR Recognition + Text Translation
Current Translation Mode：Upload Images Directly for Translation
(Advanced settings) Customize the Cloud Image Translation API
Manage custom cloud image translation API1
Manage custom cloud image translation API2
Manage custom cloud image translation API3

It looks like you have selected NLLB as the translation API, but it seems that your device has less than 8G of RAM, which may cause problems when inferring the model. Please rest assured that the program will not prevent you from using the model, but there is no guarantee that there will be no accidents when the RAM is less than 6G.
Custom API does not support language selection

It looks like you are using a custom translation API. In this case, you should not use MoeTranslate to select the source and target languages. Instead, you should write the source and target languages ​​into the API because MoeTranslate does not know the language codes specified by your custom API (some API providers do not use BCP-47 codes as their language codes).
Please fill in the API information completely
ML Kit model file not downloaded

It looks like you have selected ML Kit as the translation model, but it seems that the ML Kit model file has not been downloaded yet, so translation cannot be performed. Click Go to Download to enter the download page. The first run requires downloading a model file of about 100MB, so it is recommended to download in a WIFI environment. After the download is complete, there is no need for a network, and it can be used immediately.
The accessibility permission has been reclaimed by the system. You can re-grant the relevant permission in the tutorial in the upper right corner of the homepage.
Cannot open the selection box repeatedly
Cannot enter the translation result adjustment state repeatedly
Please adjust the translation result position first
Please select the screenshot area first
Start model initialization, please start using translation after initialization is completed...
Model initialization failed, possibly due to insufficient memory.
The model has not been initialized and the translation function cannot be used.
The translation result view has not been added and does not need to be removed.
Screen orientation change detected, please reselect the screenshot area

In this page, you can download the NLLB model file. In order to keep the download process uninterrupted, please do not leave this page while downloading. Since the file is hosted in Cloudflare R2, it may not be available for download depending on network conditions. You can flexibly switch between Wi-Fi and data traffic, and enable or disable the VPN.\n
If the file cannot be downloaded in any case, please click here to see how to download it manually.
The following %d files will be downloaded in turn:
NLLB model download status: Not downloaded

In this page, you can download ML Kit model files. In order to keep the download process from being interrupted, please do not leave this page while downloading. Since the model file is stored on Google\'s server, and the download operation is encapsulated in the ML Kit library, it cannot be controlled separately. Therefore, the download may not be possible depending on the network conditions; please flexibly switch WLAN and data traffic, and enable Or turn off the VPN.\n\nSince the download operation is encapsulated in the ML Kit library, the download progress cannot be displayed in the software. The download operation will call the system downloader and the progress should be displayed in the notification bar. The total size of the files to be downloaded is expected to be about 100MB.
ML Kit model download status: Downloaded
ML Kit model download status: Not Downloaded
The last translation task is still in progress, please wait...
Current font：%s\nChoose a font you like
The model file has been downloaded

The model file has already been downloaded to your device, so there is no need to download it again. If you do need to re-download the model file, you can click \"Delete Models\" to re-download the model.
Choose a font color you like
Choose a background color that you like
When turned on, the translation result box will be transparent, but the transparency will increase

Current mode：%s\nThe default OCR result will split a piece of text into multiple lines, which greatly reduces the translation effect. It is recommended to choose \"Direct merging\" to get the best results in most cases
Current mode：%s\n(only available in OCR mode) displays the translation result and the original text after OCR
Volc Engine API, click \"Manage Volc Engine API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 2 million characters per month).
NiuTrans API, click \"Manage NiuTrans API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 200,000 characters per day).
Baidu Translate\'s API, click \"Manage Baidu Translate API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there are 10,000 free calls for image translation per month).
Tencent Cloud\'s translation API, click \"Manage Tencent Cloud API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (10,000 free calls for image translation per month).

MoeTranslate can use the APIs of different platforms to provide translation services, which means that you need to apply for APIs from the corresponding platform. The API platform you have now selected seems to be %1$s, click \"Go Now\" to start applying for %1$s API. For more information on how to apply for %1$s API, please click \"View Tutorial\". Please note that these APIs are free to apply for, and there are quite a few free calls per month.\n\nCompared with ML Kit and NLLB and other local model translations, the translation effect of using cloud APIs is undoubtedly better, so it is recommended that you use cloud APIs for translation when the network is good.
Current image：%s\nChoose a floating ball icon you like, and the image aspect ratio is 1:1 to work better
Current judgment time：%s ms\nPress and hold the floating ball, and the judgment time of the menu will pop up, in milliseconds
Custom Text Translation API Function Description
😵Don\'t know what this is? Click me for tips.
In the Value field, use \"usesourcetext\" to represent the text to be translated
In the Value field, use \"useimgbase64\" to represent the base64 of the image to be translated.
In the Value field, use \"useimgfile\" to represent the image file to be translated.
Custom Image Translation API Function Description

⚠️ Note: This is an advanced feature that requires you to have basic API call knowledge.

1. Basic Description
This feature allows you to configure your own image translation API, supporting both GET and POST request methods. (For image translation, the POST Content-Type can be either application/json; charset=utf-8 or multipart/form-data. Simply select the appropriate Content-Type in the dropdown menu, and there’s no need to explicitly add it to the request headers below.) All API responses must be in JSON format.

2. Usage Scenarios
Typically, major translation API providers implement their own signature algorithms, making it impossible to integrate via simple GET/POST requests. As such, the practical use case for the custom image translation API is to connect with a translation API interface that you’ve built yourself.

3. Parameter Description
1、Request Method: Can be either GET or POST.
2、Content-Type (POST only): Can be application/json or multipart/form-data.
3、Base URL: Can specify http or https. If no scheme is specified, the default is https.
4、Query Parameters (GET only): Parameters appended to the base URL.
5、Request Headers: Headers sent with the request.
6、Request Body (POST only): Content included with the request.
7、JSON Response Path: Path to retrieve the translation result from the API response JSON.

Note:
1、In "Query Parameters" and the request body with Content-Type set to application/json, use "useimgbase64" to represent the image file to be translated.
2、In the request body with Content-Type set to multipart/form-data, use "useimgfile" to represent the image file to be translated.
3、Additionally, ensure that both "source language" and "target language" codes are included in the "Query Parameters" or "Request Body."

4. Request Examples
GET Request
Base URL:
https://api.example.com/translate

Query Parameters:
Key: img, Value: useimgbase64
Key: source, Value: ja
Key: target, Value: zh

Request Headers:
Authorization = my_custom_token

POST Request
Content-Type:
application/json

Base URL:
https://api.example.com/translate

Request Headers:
Authorization = my_custom_token

Request Body:
Key: img, Value: useimgbase64
Key: source, Value: ja
Key: target, Value: zh

POST Request
Content-Type:
multipart/form-data

Base URL:
https://api.example.com/translate

Request Headers:
Authorization = my_custom_token

Request Body:
Key: img, Value: useimgfile
Key: source, Value: ja
Key: target, Value: zh

5. JSON Response Path
Example 1:
Suppose the successful JSON response is as follows:

{
 "code": 0,
 "msg": "success",
 "data": {
 "translation": "Hello World"
 }
}

Then the JSON response path should be: "data.translation".

Example 2:
Suppose the successful JSON response is as follows:

{
 "code": 0,
 "msg": "success",
 "result": "Hello World"
}

Then the JSON response path should be: "result".(Excludes ".")

6. Before Using This Feature
You can first test the API response using tools like Postman or Reqable. Once the tests are successful, you can enter the relevant parameters into this feature.

⚠️ Note: This is an advanced feature that requires you to have basic API call knowledge.

1. Basic Description
This feature allows you to configure your own text translation API, supporting both GET and POST request methods. (For text translation, the POST Content-Type must and can only be application/json; charset=utf-8. There’s no need to explicitly add it to the request headers, as it’s already preset.) All API responses must be in JSON format.

2. Usage Scenarios
Typically, major translation API providers implement their own signature algorithms, making it impossible to integrate via simple GET/POST requests. As such, the practical use case for the custom text translation API is to connect with a translation API interface that you’ve built yourself.

3. Parameter Description
1、Request Method: Can be either GET or POST.
2、Base URL: Can specify http or https. If no scheme is specified, the default is https.
3、Query Parameters (GET only): Parameters appended to the base URL.
4、Request Headers: Headers sent with the request.
5、JSON Request Body (POST only): JSON content included with the request.
6、JSON Response Path: Path to retrieve the translation result from the API response JSON.

Note:
1、In "Query Parameters" and "JSON Request Body," use “usesourcetext” to represent the text to be translated.
2、Make sure to include both the "source language" and "target language" codes in the "Query Parameters" or "JSON Request Body."
3、Additionally, specify the "source language" in the main interface, as MoeTranslate requires the "source language" when performing OCR text recognition.

4. Request Examples
GET Request
Base URL:
https://api.example.com/translate

Query Parameters:
Key: text, Value: usesourcetext
Key: source, Value: ja
Key: target, Value: zh

Request Headers:
Authorization = my_custom_token

POST Request
Base URL:
https://api.example.com/translate

Request Headers:
Authorization = my_custom_token

JSON Request Body:
Key: text, Value: usesourcetext
Key: source, Value: ja
Key: target, Value: zh

5. JSON Response Path
Example 1:
Suppose the successful JSON response is as follows:

{
 "code": 0,
 "msg": "success",
 "data": {
 "translation": "Hello World"
 }
}

Then the JSON response path should be: "data.translation".

Example 2:
Suppose the successful JSON response is as follows:

{
 "code": 0,
 "msg": "success",
 "result": "Hello World"
}

Then the JSON response path should be: "result".(Excludes ".")

6. Before Using This Feature
You can first test the API response using tools like Postman or Reqable. Once the tests are successful, you can enter the relevant parameters into this feature.
JSON Response Path cannot be blank
Gemini is Google\'s latest generative AI, and it\'s very easy to configure, but if you\'re in China, you\'ll probably need a VPN to use it. Click \"View Tutorial\" to see how to get Gemini\'s API.

Please configure the following options to start your translation journey

The translation result will be displayed here, please be careful not to coincide with the position of the original text, so as not to affect the translation of the screenshot.

MoeTranslate caches up to the last 200 screenshots when it is translated, and it will be overwritten when the screenshots are greater than 200, and these screenshots are saved in the Android/data/com.moe.moetranslator/cache/screenshots folder, which you can view in the file management at any time. Generally speaking, these screenshots won\'t take up much space, and of course, you can also choose to clear these cache data now.
The Translation Floatingball seems to be still running, so please turn it off before adjusting the settings
The source language and the target language are the same, which is a meaningless translation combination

The translation API can be used without configuring a key, and is implemented by simulating a browser accessing Bing Translate for the web. This method relies on the structure of the web page and the extraction of tokens, which is less stable and may be subject to access restrictions, so please use other translation APIs more.

Microsoft Azure AI Translator API, click \"Manage Azure API\" below to set up the API, and you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 2 million characters per month).
Do not display the adjustment completion prompt
When turned on, when the box selects the area to complete the translation or adjusts the position of the completed translation result, the prompt text will not pop up
Are you sure you want to delete model %1$s? This operation is irreversible.
Please don’t give too weird names.

Fill in the name of the model you want to import below, then go to the folder containing the \".model3.json\" file for the model in the file manager and click the \"Use this folder\" button at the bottom of the screen.\n\nYou can click the \"View Tutorial\" button below for more detailed information (such as the infrastructure of Live2D model files, and the issue that some models cannot be played after importing emoticons and actions, etc.).
No files ending in .model3.json were found, please check if the selected folder is correct
It was so fun, play it again!

Screenshot Translation requires accessibility permissions to take screenshots. Click to grant accessibility permissions to grant the app.

The specific authorization path varies slightly on devices of different brands, roughly:
General tab → Downloaded apps → Find "MoeTranslateTranslation Service" → Use "MoeTranslate Translation Service".
When granting permissions, a warning will pop up. Please rest assured that MoeTranslate will not collect any of your information.
Actually, I\'d like to see the flowers again
Why is my HarmonyOS version 3.0 or greater, but it still says that the Android version is too low?

This is due to the fact that after Huawei updated HarmonyOS (note that it is not HarmonyOS NEXT), its underlying Android API can no longer be visually visible to users. For most newer Huawei phones, HarmonyOS 2.0 supports Android 10 (API 29). HarmonyOS 3.0 is compatible with Android 12 (API 31). However, for some older Huawei models, although HarmonyOS 3.0 has been updated, the underlying Android API has not been updated, and the underlying Android version of some models is still Android 10. As a result, the system still does not meet the requirements of Android 11 (API 30) for this software. Here are some of the known models:\n\nEquipped with Kirin 980 and below models, such as mate20, P30, Nova 5, etc., HarmonyOS 3.0 corresponds to Android version 10 (API 29). The HarmonyOS 3.0 of these models is not really 3.0, and there are many missing features, but the main upgrades are: updating the version number, using the new theme of 3.0, and adding some small features that do not depend on Android 12.
Why do I have granted accessibility permissions, but the software still prompts that I have not obtained accessibility permissions?

This is due to accessibility permissions being reclaimed by the system; Accessibility is a very important permission in Android. Most Android-based systems will revoke accessibility privileges when you exit the software or shut down and restart it, also for security reasons (of course, this software is open source and does not collect any information from you).\n\nKnowing the reason, it is also very easy to solve. As long as the software homepage clicks on the \"? > find the step to grant accessibility permissions - > click \"Go to grant this permission\" - > find the software, then turn off the accessibility permissions of the software, and re-grant them.
Adjust this option in the \"Translation Mode\" and \"API Configuration\" of the Settings page
Why did I click on the hoverball, but there was no translation result for a long time, and finally an error was reported?

This is most likely due to poor internet connections. Many waifu games need to use accelerators, but after using accelerators, it is relatively slow to access the domestic translation API. As a result, the translation will time out and errors will occur.\n\nAt this time, please turn off your wifi, turn on the data data, and then speed up with the accelerator again. At this point, you should be able to use the translation fluently. There is no need to worry about data consumption, generally speaking, when you use the translation mode of \"local OCR recognition + text translation\", the amount of traffic spent is minimal.

The error code for Baidu Translate （Text） can be found at the link below:\nNote: You need to use desktop UA to browse normally, otherwise you will be redirected to the homepage of Baidu Translation Open Platform.\nhttps://fanyi-api.baidu.com/doc/21

Bing Translator does not require an API key to be configured to use it, and this is because it does so by simulating the behavior of a browser visiting a web page, which is a very non-standard approach. Because of this, MoeTranslate cannot guarantee its stability. When you have problems using Bing Translate, it is recommended that you use other translation APIs for translation, and you are also welcome to submit feedback in [Settings] - > [About] - > [Feedback] for fixes in subsequent versions.
The error code for NiuTrans can be found at the link below:\n\nhttps://niutrans.com/documents/contents/trans_text#error
The error code for Volc Engine can be found at the link below:\n\nhttps://www.volcengine.com/docs/4640/65067#%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%A3%E8%AF%B4%E6%98%8E
The error code for Azure AI Translate can be found at the link below:\n\nhttps://learn.microsoft.com/azure/ai-services/translator/reference/v3-0-translate#response-status-codes

The error code for Baidu Translate （Pic） can be found at the link below:\nNote: You need to use desktop UA to browse normally, otherwise you will be redirected to the homepage of Baidu Translation Open Platform.\nhttps://fanyi-api.baidu.com/doc/26
The error code for Tencent Cloud （OCR） can be found at the link below:\n\nhttps://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/551/15619#6.-.E9.94.99.E8.AF.AF.E7.A0.81
The error code for Tencent Cloud （Pic） can be found at the link below:\n\nhttps://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/551/17232#6.-.E9.94.99.E8.AF.AF.E7.A0.81
You can take a screenshot of the QR code below and scan it in WeChat; Or search for \"MoeTranslate\" in WeChat to follow the official account.
MoeTranslate uses the LGPL-3.0 license to open source, you can visit the GitHub repository at any time, welcome to give the project a \"Star🌟\".
Kotlin extensions for Android core functionality, providing many Kotlin-specific extensions.\nhttps://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/core
Backward-compatible Android UI component library, ensuring new visual design features can run on older Android versions.\nhttps://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/appcompat
Component library implementing Material Design, providing modern UI design components.\nhttps://github.com/material-components/material-components-android
Flexible layout manager allowing creation of large and complex layouts.\nhttps://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/constraintlayout
Component that simplifies Android in-app navigation implementation.\nhttps://developer.android.com/guide/navigation
Excellent HTTP client library with HTTP/2 support and network request interceptors.\nhttps://square.github.io/okhttp/
Java HTML parser providing capabilities to extract and manipulate data using DOM, CSS, and jquery-like methods. \nhttps://jsoup.org/
Google\'s machine learning toolkit providing text recognition (OCR) and translation capabilities.\nhttps://developers.google.com/ml-kit
Android particle effects library for creating cool visual effects. \nhttps://github.com/DanielMartinus/Konfetti
Efficient image loading and caching library for Android. \nhttps://github.com/bumptech/glide
Framework for displaying and manipulating Live2D models. \nhttps://www.live2d.com
Google\'s core Java libraries providing many utility classes. \nhttps://github.com/google/guava
Kotlin\'s coroutine support library for asynchronous programming. \nhttps://github.com/Kotlin/kotlinx.coroutines
Android data persistence library providing an abstraction layer over SQLite database. \nhttps://developer.android.com/jetpack/androidx/releases/room
Open source real-time translation app for Android that runs locally.\nhttps://github.com/niedev/RTranslator

Magia Record is a mobile game, and the Live2D model of Kaname Madoka in the Live2D page comes from this game. It is only used as a preset model to demonstrate the software\'s functionality, and all rights belong to the original creators.\nhttps://magireco.com
Life is a wilderness, not a track.\nThe answers are on the road, and freedom is in the wind.\nA respectful heart is not found in empty words.
Automatic translation is enabled, please pay attention to API quota consumption
Screen orientation change detected and automatic translation is turned off
Set the time interval for automatic translation
Current time interval: %s ms\nWhen automatic translation is turned on, the time interval between each automatic translation judgment

Current word length threshold: %s\n(only available in OCR mode) Each time an automatic translation decision is performed, the similarity judgment will not be performed on strings with OCR results less than the length of the word, and the translation process will proceed directly

Current similarity threshold: %s\n(only available in OCR mode) Each time the automatic translation decision is made, the similarity between the current OCR result and the previous OCR result is compared, and the string with less than the similarity will be translated, and if it is greater than the previous OCR result, it will be considered the same as the previous OCR result and will not be translated
The similarity between the two strings is calculated using the Levenshtein distance, enter a decimal between 0 and 1
